initial_question.title: RacingDSX compatibility
initial_question.body:
Affter using DSY with RacingDSX without any problems, I switched over to DSY-v2. The connection works but the triggers behave in a very different way, at least for Forza Horizon 5 (too snappy). I don't think it is the intended way of working

Thank you for your hard working

satisfaction_conditions: Trigger behavior matches DSX version 1.4.9 specifications
User understands the reason for perceived behavior change

initial_question.title: The application does not start
initial_question.body:
When I launch DSX.exe it just pops up console window for a sec and then nothing happen.
Windows 11 24h2

satisfaction_conditions: Application successfully launches and remains running
Software version compatibility with Windows 11 24h2 is established
